summary: A behind the scenes look at the comedy troupe, The Kids In The Hall's 1999-2000 reunion tour.
cast: Dave Foley|Bruce McCulloch|Kevin McDonald|Mark McKinney|Scott Thompson|Paul Bellini|Breanne Munro|Conan O'Brien|Andy Richter|Max Weinberg|Adam Jones|Craig Northey|Buzz Osborne
title: Kids in the Hall: Same Guys, New Dresses
